title: Kayle's Splash Art changed in 9.17 patch
body:
No one:
Literally no one:
Riot: Changes Kayle's splash art.
https://imgur.com/kStguH8
How her face is supposed to look:
https://am-a.akamaihd.net/image?f=http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/9.16.1/img/champion/Kayle.png&resize=64:

Its honestly kind of disturbing that her face is completely blacked out, and I (along with several others who I have pointed this out to) prefer her with a face. At least give her back her eyes if not her whole face because it really looks off. Upvote please if you agree.

replies.body:
Honestly I actually prefer the new version. 
Seeing her face beneath the helmet always looked a bit off, most likely because you could never see a lot of her face, so it just felt a bit cluttered with these small gaps that show her face.

Kayle's helmet is like that in her original splash art and no one bats an eye.
Riot changes her helmet back to the way it was before and everyone loses their minds.

I'm not seeing the problem here.

Because it now looks like a shitty fan edit, and the eyes gave her more emotion and character in her splash. I dunno why the fuck they just randomly decided to alter it.

The face under her mask looked worse and there was no point for it to be there in the first place other than to show her face.

Plus, Pantheon's helmet is the same way. It completely obscures his face in shadow like it did before his rework. I don't understand why Kayle's should be any different.

100% agree with everything. Yeah its not the fact of her face not showing, its how it doesn't fit in the splash art. For example, you can't see Pantheon's face, but it fits because the art style, and its the same with old Kayle. This just looks very off. I think it takes a certain type of art style to pull off and the art style of Kayle and Morgana isn't a good fit for a "faceless" helmet. The eyes gave an identity. I believe that quote "the eyes are the window to the soul" applies here.

Have you considered some of us like the emotionless aspect? I think its way more badass/symbolic personally of her unwavering opinion on "justice" etc that was the reason for morganas conflict with her, and a lot of the problems of how she saw things no?

Just my take. No offense meant or anything but I lovef the old splash having nothing seen in the helm and am glad to have it back.
